backend.tradesystem.trader_managers

Class TradingInfoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.tradesystem.Manager
      • backend.tradesystem.trader_managers.TradingInfoManager

  • public class TradingInfoManager
extends Manager
    Handles anything about getting info on trading and tradable items, but this does not handle trading itself

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradingInfoManager()
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFrequentTraders(java.lang.String traderId)
      Return the 3 most frequent traders that this trader has traded with.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRecentTradeItems(java.lang.String traderId)
      Gets a list of the items used in trades
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTradableItemsWithName(java.lang.String name)
      Gets tradable item ids that has the name substring within the input name string For example, if the item name is "Apple Pie", and the name to check for is "apple", then that TradableItem is included as a list of items to return
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTrader(java.lang.String name)
      Return trader ids that contain name
      java.lang.String[] suggestLend(java.lang.String traderId, boolean inCity, SuggestionStrategy strategy)
      Returns the suggestion provided by a suggest lend algorithm
      java.lang.String[] suggestTrade(java.lang.String traderId, boolean inCity, SuggestionStrategy strategy)
      Returns the suggestion provided by a suggest trade algorithm

        public TradingInfoManager()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the objects to get items from databases

    • Method Detail

      • searchTrader

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTrader(java.lang.String name)
        Return trader ids that contain name
        Parameters:
        name - the string to search for
        Returns:
        traders with similar names

      • getTradableItemsWithName

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTradableItemsWithName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets tradable item ids that has the name substring within the input name string For example, if the item name is "Apple Pie", and the name to check for is "apple", then that TradableItem is included as a list of items to return
        Parameters:
        name - the name to check for
        Returns:
        list of tradable item ids that match the name

      • getFrequentTraders

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFrequentTraders(java.lang.String traderId)
                                                    throws AuthorizationException,
                                                           UserNotFoundException,
                                                           TradeNotFoundException
        Return the 3 most frequent traders that this trader has traded with.
        Parameters:
        traderId - the trader being checked for
        Returns:
        a Trader list of the 3 most frequently traded with Traders
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if the traderid does not represent a trader
        UserNotFoundException - user not found
        TradeNotFoundException - trade not found

      • getRecentTradeItems

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRecentTradeItems(java.lang.String traderId)
                                                     throws AuthorizationException,
                                                            TradeNotFoundException,
                                                            UserNotFoundException
        Gets a list of the items used in trades
        Parameters:
        traderId - the trader id
        Returns:
        list of tradable items ids that were recently traded
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - trader not allowed to get recently traded items
        TradeNotFoundException - trade not found
        UserNotFoundException - trader id is bad

      • suggestLend

        public java.lang.String[] suggestLend(java.lang.String traderId,
                                      boolean inCity,
                                      SuggestionStrategy strategy)
                               throws UserNotFoundException,
                                      AuthorizationException
        Returns the suggestion provided by a suggest lend algorithm
        Parameters:
        traderId - trader id
        strategy - The lending strategy to use
        inCity - whether to filter for city or not
        Returns:
        A lend suggestion in the form [fromUserId, toUserId, itemIdToLend]
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user can not be found
        AuthorizationException - if the user is frozen

      • suggestTrade

        public java.lang.String[] suggestTrade(java.lang.String traderId,
                                       boolean inCity,
                                       SuggestionStrategy strategy)
                                throws UserNotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Returns the suggestion provided by a suggest trade algorithm
        Parameters:
        traderId - trader id
        strategy - The trading strategy to use
        inCity - whether to filter for city or not
        Returns:
        A trade suggestion in the form of [fromUserId, toUserId, lendItemId, receiveItemId]
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - bad trader ids
        AuthorizationException - can't suggest because user is not a trader or is frozen
